title: Rock & Roll Murders
description: His jealousy and greed became a deadly murder for hire. Based on a true untold story. This story is set in the Inland Empire region of Southern California in the 1970s-1990s. Raymond McDade was dealing with the devil when he bought the radio station that made him wealthy. Now, with a young, beautiful wife, his next obsession was to keep her and the successful business for the rest of his life. He was proved wrong. What ensued was a circus of events consisting of murders, extortion, and chaos that led to a million dollar courtroom trial where he maintains, up to this day, his innocence. Will you hate the man or sympathize with him?
author: Phillip B. Chute
